warning_message: DANGER: Ingesting bleach or chlorine dioxide is toxic and potentially fatal
safe_alternative: Consult licensed healthcare providers for any medical treatment

warning_message: Essential oils are not proven treatments for serious diseases or infections
safe_alternative: Consult healthcare providers for medical treatment, use oils only as complementary

warning_message: These remedies trap heat, increase infection risk, and can worsen burns
safe_alternative: Cool burn under cool (not cold) running water for 10-20 minutes

warning_message: Improper tourniquet use can cause permanent tissue damage and limb loss
safe_alternative: Apply direct pressure first; tourniquet only for life-threatening bleeding

warning_message: Inducing vomiting can cause additional damage, especially with caustic substances
safe_alternative: Call Poison Control immediately (1-800-222-1222 in US)
source: American Association of Poison Control Centers

warning_message: Tilting head back causes blood to flow down throat, causing nausea/vomiting
safe_alternative: Lean slightly forward, pinch soft part of nose for 10-15 minutes

warning_message: Alcohol is absorbed through skin and can cause alcohol poisoning, especially in children
safe_alternative: Use lukewarm water, appropriate fever medications, and seek medical care if severe

warning_message: Removing impaled objects can cause massive bleeding and additional damage
safe_alternative: Stabilize the object in place, control bleeding around it, get emergency help

warning_message: Hydrogen peroxide and alcohol damage healthy tissue and slow healing
safe_alternative: Clean wounds with clean water or saline, apply antibiotic ointment

warning_message: This can cause injury to both the person seizing and the helper
safe_alternative: Clear area, protect head, time the seizure, don't restrain, call 911 if over 5 min
